snippet.title: RollerGirl - Official Developer Video | Black Voices in Gaming 2024
snippet.description: Meet Indigo Doyle, creative lead at Pushing Vertices, to learn about RollerGirl and what you can expect from this upcoming action-adventure game. Doyle discusses the importance of music in the game, movement, exploration, and more. RollerGirl will be available on PC.
